name: Bubbakeys
tagline: Press some keys, hear Bubba speak.
body:
# bubbakeys.js Press some keys, hear Bubba speak. _Now with 97.2% less jQuery! (jQuery, we still love you)_ ### Setup: 1. Include "bubbakeys.js" in your page. 2. Initialize the bubbakeys plugin once the DOM has loaded: ```javascript // Hear Bubba when "c", "a", "r" and "l" keys are pressed bubbakeys('carl'); ``` Demo available at [http://broeneatsdinner.github.io/bubbakeys/](http://broeneatsdinner.github.io/bubbakeys/).
More info at [https://github.com/broeneatsdinner/bubbakeys](https://github.com/broeneatsdinner/bubbakeys).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
